modName: master vampire summon now with new perk
summary: this is a mod that lets you summon a master vampire for 30 seconds.with now added perk
descriptionHtml:
mod by mrwoody 

MOD DESCRIPTION 
have you ever thought that the summons in skyrim are a bit powerless and pathetic and not worth using, if you have this mod is for you

this mod adds a book to witerun on the floor near dragonsreach.this mod will let you summon a level 81 master vampire to help you fight against your enimies striking fear into there eyes.

UPDATE v1.5 

this new update wich is optional will allow you to have an extra perk on the conjuration tree called summon master vampire wich is located left of the tree.this perk has 4 upgrades to help reduce the cost of the spell to finally nothing.i created this perk for a reason to help every character even levels 3,4,5,6  to have a go at using the spell,so you will be a badass at even level 6.even though this is a high novice spell it will still allow other low character levels to use it if your willing to spend the perks.



KNOWN PROBLEMS 
for version 1.0 there are no know problems at the minute 

for version 1.5 there is one problem this is when you put a skill point  into the perk it will also downgrade every novice spell aswell (fixing)

MY OTHER MODS 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29296      mageball of death 


UPDATE 1.5.5 

THIS UPDATE CONSISTS OF BETTER PLACEMENT OF THE PERK AND I HAVE ADDED A EXTRA NEW LEVEL TO THE PERK BECAUSE I FOUNT  THAT IT WAS TO EASY TO ADVANCE ALL YOUR PERK POINTS IN IT SO I MADE AN EXTRA LEVEL TO IT.ALSO I HAVE FIXED SOME MINOR BUGS LIKE SPELLING AND MISSED PLACED WORDS.ALSO THE PLACEMENT OF THE PERK HAS BEEN ADJUSTED TO THE MIDDLE OF THE TREE INSTEAD OF THE ORIGNAL OUT OF PLACE SPOT 

CHECK OUT MY NEW MOD
author: mrwoody

files.name: master vampire summon with perk        update
